links.*: The Children of Húrin Release Party

wikitext.*:
'''Pieter Collier''' is the webmaster and creator of  [http://www.tolkienlibrary.com TolkienLibrary.com], a writer, and an avid [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] book collector.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.abebooks.com/docs/RareBooks/Avid-Collector/Jun06/collector-profiles.shtml?cm_ven=nl&cm_cat=ac-2006-06&cm_pla=body&cm_ite=collector-profile|articlename=AbeBooks Collector Profile: Pieter Collier & His Tolkien Library|dated=|website=[http://www.abebooks.com/ AbeBooks.com]|accessed=12 February 2013}}</ref> He is also Library Consultant and webmaster of the [[Greisinger Museum]].<ref>[http://www.gmec.ch/en/index.html Greisinger Museum] (accessed 12 February 2013)</ref>

==Bibliography==
===Books===
*[[2011]]: [[A Tolkien Tapestry|''A Tolkien Tapestry: Pictures to accompany'' The Lord of the Rings]] (editor)

===Articles===
*[[2010]]: [[Amon Hen 226|''Amon Hen'' 226]]
**"Request for information on Cor Blok paintings"
*[[2011]]: ''[[Lembas (journal)|Lembas Extra]]''
** "Collecting Tolkien Books, from Hobbits to Dragons — There and Back again"

==Awards==
* [[2006]] - '''[[Imperishable Flame Award]]''', Tolkien/Inklings Fan Appreciation, ''Tolkien Library''
* [[2007]] - '''Imperishable Flame Award''', Tolkien/Inkling Fan Community Award, ''[[The Children of Húrin Release Party]]''
